Posts.Content: Apr 29, 2010 12:38PM kelgrover wrote: I may remove it if it gets any longer...especially since I will be on Tamoxifen for the next 5 years.  Thanks for all your responses!
Posts.Title: Facial hair??? kelgrover Titan

Posts.Content: kelgrover wrote: I've been on chemotherapy since November.  I am currently on weekly treatment of Taxol and Herceptin.  I know that chemo can effect your hormones, I get hot flashes and haven't seen my period lately.  But can it also cause facial hair?  Recently I am finding that the sides of my face has a very fine fuzz...that I can actually feel in the wind.  Will this go away after treatment???  Nothing like being a bald woman with facial fuzz! Dx 9/30/2009, 2cm, Stage IIA, Grade 3, 0/4 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Facial hair??? kelgrover Titan

Posts.Content: Apr 21, 2010 08:22AM kelgrover wrote: Thank you ladies!  I might just have to try trimming it.  It's really bothering me.  Ahh, the many joys of chemo :-)  I have to go on Tamoxifen for 5 years after chemo, so I'm assuming that it will probably stick around.
